Review.Contenu: My laptop should accommodate an upgrade to windows 10; however, it will NOT handle the “tool” that is required to install the upgrade!  When I discovered this only moments after placing my order I requested that the charge be reversed. The company accepts no responsibility for the lack of information that lead to this pointless purchase. They want a screen shot of the error message and sent me instructions on how to do this on a Windows 10 computer… Duh, I don’t HAVE windows 10… that’s why I ordered it.  Not worth the hassle to try to recover the wasted expense. They basically assume that every customer is a liar and cheat. It’s 20 bucks… Not hardly worth insulting the customer, but they did!

Carefully reviewed specs. Ordered Visio 2016 for Windows 7. Downloaded, attempted installation. Failed with some corny message saying "when it's fixed we'll let you know". Chatted up agent/bot without resolution. Have heard nothing back from GetPCOnline support. Credit card charged ASAP and I have no product.

Bought Win 10 Pro & key doesn't work.  Convoluted instructions are for upgrade from Home to Pro, which is not what I bought.  Instructions said to enter 2 different "generic" codes, then restart, then enter "unique" product code they sent.  When tried to activate error message was that my PC had to be connected to my company's network in order to activate. I am not a company.  I am a single PC. getPConline does not respond to calls or emails.

Review.Titre: Windows11 would not load, no response from email support
Review.Contenu: I was hoping that the requisite update from Windows7 wouldn't be a major project - wrong!  The MS Office Pro suite would only load in 32-bit mode and Windows11, (yes, was under the impression I could go from Windows7 to 11....), would not load defeating my entire purpose.  Contacted support and to date, no response.  Not good.

My name is David Smith.  Sale #18473.  I've been trying unsuccessfully for two days to get help with not being able to activate the Microsoft Version of WORD that I purchased from you because of an 'INVALID' Activation Code.  Your customer service is not good at all.   The girl I spoke to on 'CHAT' told me I couldn't actually speak to a live person because of COVID.....guess there wasn't a phone by her computer.  Really disappointed!

Review.Titre: This was a scam, don’t trust this vendor!!
Review.Contenu: This was a scam, don’t trust this vendor! Did not get what I ordered (ordered Visio license and got an img file that won’t open and has virus warning messages), and no way to contact the vendor…no email response and phone number that’s listed on the website does not exist.

Review.Titre: They are selling microsoft 365 and calling it OFFICE
Review.Contenu: They are selling microsoft 365 and calling it microsoft office.  It downloads microsoft one-drive and many other programs that steal your info for microsoft to re-sell without permission.  Even that isnt too terrible. What is annoying is that i have called and i have emailed because the digital download was corrupt. Word, powerpoint, and excel work perfectly but now i cannot open outlook at all and have lost access to my emails.  Nothing happens when i hit the icon, and it uninstalled my prior version.  So now i will have to buy 'outlook' a la carte somewhere.  YOU GET WHAT U PAY FOR MY DAD ALWAYS SAID.

Review.Titre: Not Happy. Got very little Getpconline support.
Review.Contenu: Bought Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Student for Windows.This was last week. Still haven't been able to download and install on Windows 10.Got miniusule amount of direction from Getpconline. Asked for more help and request went unanswered.

This company is deceptive. All there products are digital downloads only. It does not say digital in the product description. As matter of fact when I complained about this the only place they can find it is under shipping info.There other places where you can purchase digital downloads that specify it's a digital download. Do not purchase from this company!

Review.Titre: I am a repeat customer. I was scammed.
Review.Contenu: I am a repeat customer.I ordered 6 licenses and only received 3 product keys.I left 5 messages between emails, their website, phone message.No one answered no one wrote back.

Review.Titre: Beware. Key did not work properly so unable to download any programs
Review.Contenu: My product code/key did not work (said it was already used), so couldn’t properly load load any programs. They have policy of “no refunds” according to customer service. Beware. Ended up purchasing from Microsoft directly and had flawless installation with a working key.

They sold me a faulty product and a faulty activation code. It's been 5 months and I STILL have not been able to activate my Microsoft Office. The worst part? I have contacted their customer service several times and the problem still isn't resolved. They also do not offer refunds so I basically threw $50 in the garbage. Buyers beware!

Review.Titre: It never worked I have tried several…
Review.Contenu: It never worked I have tried several times to use the key code, received “the code was invalid” message each time.No contact about how to rectify the situation, just the same line and same instructions I tried to follow.Would appreciate an email or phone call.Yvonne Smith

Total rip-off. It was false advertising. Advertised windows 8 compatible Microsoft program which I was unable to download. When attempting to download message read. Suggest you purchase windows 10. Left message with on line chat. They promised to resolve issue. Nope.

Purchased MS Office 2021 in March 2022.  In late August 2022, I started getting notices from MS that the product would be deactivated.  I emailed PC Online's customer support with my order number on Sept 9 but never heard back from them.  My Excel & Word have now been deactivated by MS and still no response from PC Online.  I called their customer service phone number (1-318-303-5593) only to find out it is not a legitimate number.  They claim to be in Wilmington DE but the number comes up as in Rayville, LA.

Review.Titre: I was given an activation key that was already sold.
Review.Contenu: I was given an activation key that was already in use by someone else.  When I tried to contact someone it was impossible.  I placed this order on April 10th and I never received a response except by email 3 days later on April 13th.  Very poor customer service.

This is a scam Purchased MS Office. Activation code had already been used. Called the office phone number but learned it is not a voice phone number. Sent a text but no responses Sent email through the help link but no response Sent another directly to the address but no response. This is robbery and should not be allowed to operate. Absolutely a scam

Review.Titre: I purchased a win 11 key from pconline…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a win 11 key from pconline put it didn't work, i contacted  them and they kept me online until 12:00am , they ask for a screen shot of the error message, I could accomplish that so they sent me a e-mail abandoned my request, for help. and left me hanging.

I placed my order in good faith for windows 10 and windows 11 upgrades. Trying to salvage an old laptop for my son. The program did not work as advertised and so I asked for technical help which was provided to an extent but then I was told to go to Microsoft for any subsequent answers. At this point I asked for a refund which was refused. I don’t believe I was treated fairly in this process.

I have tried contacting them for over 2 weeks - I tried to install and got a "Code not valid" message - they have not gotten back to me - total scam. I called Microsoft to see if they could help and they told me that they are not affiliated and they do not have a license agreement with them. They are thieves and scammers

Review.Titre: Pay Microsoft direct, software activates then
Review.Contenu: The key doesn't work, so I can't activate. I've been trying to get in touch with someone for 2 months and don't get a return email or call. Would NEVER recommend to anyone! Costing me time and business. Can't access the software I've now purchased Twice from you

Following a set of pretty clear instructions, I was able to download and install my newly purchased version of Office 2019.  However, the authorization failed.  On contacting support I was given another set of different instructions that also worked to download and install Office.  But once again authorization failed with the message that the product key was invalid.  I am left without my original Office package that I deleted to install the new one, and I am in need of the package in my day-to-day work.  I hope it can still be resolved.

Review.Titre: Product doesn't work and no refunds will be given
Review.Contenu: I can't use office student 2021 that I purchased and they won't give money back. Computer says my account doesn't have products needed when I try to create a new document or read old file. Asks for product key but won't let me enter it. I sent 3 hours working on it on my own then spen 2 more hours on chat. She just kept telling me to do the same thing over and over that wasn't working. Finally gave me a ticket number and said she was forwarding this to the department that can help. I was supposed to get email with ticket number shortly after and never received. They were going to email me with solution and now 2 days later still have not received any emails for them.

Review.Titre: I purchased 2 Win 11 Pro licenses as I…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 2 Win 11 Pro licenses as I have done before, and when I received the confirmation email with the link to download, instruction said "contact the merchant for the licenses" I have called and emailed 2-3 times with no response. Either provide me to valid licenses that I paid for or a full refund.

Review.Titre: I am sure this review will not be…
Review.Contenu: I am sure this review will not be posted. I am very unsatisfied because we never received our order. Yet I get this email today wanting me to rate my experience when in fact I try to call the number is not in service I have sent two email and no replies back. I might have lost 34.99 but you will probably loose a lot more.

Review.Titre: The Product Key code does not work
Review.Contenu: The Product Key code does not work.  I tried to contact them by phone and left a voice mail, sent them an email and sent a text message and got no response from anyone.  I still do not have access to the product that I purchased and would like a full refund since I cannot use the product!!

Review.Titre: No support and wrong product delivered
Review.Contenu: It appears I was sent the wrong software for download and thus the key did not match. I ordered the Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business for Windows and when downloading the software I received Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2021. I sent screen shots of all the relevant information to support@getpconline and never received a reply. When contacting the in person chat on the website I was told on several occasions that my case would be expedited, but was never contacted. I have given up hope and have written off what I have paid. I have learned my lesson that this is too good to be true and moving forward will just buy from a distributor that will supply the product as described and provide support when there is an issue.

Bought my software. Downloaded the IMG file. The file wouldn't mount on Windows 11. Sent an email to Support describing the error message. Support replied asking for a screenshot. Sent it. That was the last I've heard from them 6 days ago.

Review.Titre: Don't buy software from this company
Review.Contenu: Don't buy software from this company. Your product license key will stop working and they will claim you have tried to use it more than once. NOT THE CASE and they will not honor a replacement. They are fraudulent. Buy from the manufacturer of the software you need.
No ability to contact them. Purchased MS Office 2016 and they sent Office 2019 which was not compatible with my Outlook calendar. Will dispute charge.

Review.Titre: The software I purchase will not download!
Review.Contenu: The software I purchase will not dowload on my pc. For a week now I have tried to chat with customer service..left my email to be contacted and also sent two emails for support...no one has ever gotten back to me.  I'm frustrated and feel like this company is a scam...I feel ripped off. Beware!

Review.Titre: I am still waiting on license keys for…
Review.Contenu: I am still waiting on license keys for order 20745.  The two keys for order 20744 are invalid.  I have sent two emails for tech support, and have left two VM's.  I have not had a responce yet.  How soon before I do?Gil,

Review.Titre: I didn’t get what I paid for now I just…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t get what I paid for now I just want a new pc because I have viruses on my old one with what I purchased and downloaded

The word processor is gone, I can't find it. I deleted e mails and cannot find them anymore. It was difficult to download and get going, but now it is gone. Money wasted. I want my money back since I no longer have the software.

Review.Titre: The people who own this company are scam artists who take your money then give you software with product keys that don't work!!!
Review.Contenu: This company can improve by giving you product keys that work for the lifetime of the product you have bought from them.  I bought Microsoft Office 2019 Professional Plus, Visio Pro 2019, and Project 2019 Pro from getpconline.com last February 9, 2022.  I was given product keys for all three of these products.  The product key for MS Office 2019 Professional Plus (8H3NM-G2HM8-CP2X2-HRTKK-P39GG) worked for only four months.  After the fifth month (July 2022), when I tried to use the Office 2019 Professional Plus, there was (and still is) a statement above the menu bar saying:Document1 [Compatibility Mode] - Word (Unlicensed Product)There is also a pink strip below the menu bar stating:NOTICE   Most features are disabled because your Office product is inactive.  To use for free, sign in and use the Web version.There was phone support last July, which is now no more immediately after the person chatting with me could not help me with the product key.  I was then told that she would forward my product key issue with an "urgently needed support" title to a higher support person to either help me with my key or to give me another key that would work.  I waited two weeks in vain.  I then emailed this company and was asked for my order number (which is 8234)  I emailed them my order number and sent the entire history of my problem with my product key.  I never heard from them just like I never got a phone call from them -- even when I called the number they asked customers to call, (318) 303-5593, just to get a voicemail promising that someone will get back to me.  No one ever does.It's too bad I cannot give getpconline.com a negative numbered review.  They stole my money.

Review.Titre: Didn't get the keys from my purchase
Review.Contenu: Didn't get the keys from my purchase. Just an email to contact merchant for license. Shoot them an email, and then never heard back.

Review.Titre: I bought Project and the download link…
Review.Contenu: I bought Project and the download link doesn't work.  Support has not responded to my request for help.
I can't activate the software. It says that the number of allowed versions has been exceeded.
You are a scamming website and have been reported to MS legal as well as investigation cases with Goldman Sachs.
Lousy customer service, key never validated, after receiving payment and trying several times to install, no matter what key they give me Yvonne

horrible price increases over 100% in 2 months!!!!!!!!!!

Review.Titre: They charged me twice for the same…
Review.Contenu: They charged me twice for the same product.  Also, I tried calling twice and they never answered.

Ordered Microsoft Office 2021 Pro Plus, followed the instructions for the download - no luck.  Got response to e-mail with skightly different instructions.  Very confusing and when put in the address, response was " server error"  File not found.  No response to phone call, haven't gotten the chat room yet either.  Put in QR code for produce, Microsoft denies the code.  Not happy.

Your damn software crashed my whole computer. I can't do anything on it or with it. I'm going to have to take it somewhere to get it swiped clean of everything- which means losing pictures and docs I have saved to my computer. And no I cannot download them to a hard drive because my 2 year old laptop is useless since downloading YOUR software. Would NEVER recommend!!!!

Review.Titre: Shopping with your store has been a…
Review.Contenu: Shopping with your store has been a nightmare.   I was not able to install the product and when I called for technical support next day, they gave the wrong product instructions.  After a whole day dealing with "technical support"   not only they gave me the wrong product, they wanted to charge me again. for the wrong product...Best Buy may be my future option.

Review.Titre: I am trying to resolve a problem. Please refund my money for the second non-used purchase!
Review.Contenu: I am trying to resolve a problem. The problem is I ordered two copies of your Microsoft office package. It was a double order… Software did not load previous order fast enough… Second order placed… Information loaded onto my computer only to find a second order was paid for in confusion. That’s why the low rating. Please refund my money for the second non-used purchase!

Review.Titre: I was never sent an order confirmation
Review.Contenu: I was never sent an order confirmation. I thought I purchased Office 2021.When I tried to open the program I was ask if if I wanted to up grade as I had the free addition. I contacted thru CHAT and was given the royal run around by three people.I ask to cancel my order but never got confirmation of cancelling. I emailed support  and again ask to cancel my order. Again I got nothing.

Review.Titre: I tried to download the Microsoft…
Review.Contenu: I tried to download the Microsoft office 2019 that I purchased from Get PC online, and I was on the chat line for over three hours. The two employers that I was emailing were not able to get it done. I was told that I would get an email from an employee that could get the job done. No email has arrive to date. I had to hire an IT guy, and I am going to see if he can get it done.

The software could not download properly after at least a half dozen tries, and took over 24 hours to even download a portion of it. The answers from the help desk did no good either. Why would they tell me to download it to another computer than the one I wanted it on??? I went to the Microsoft store, ordered it there and it downloaded in less than an hour. At least Getpconline refunded my money promptly.

I have purchased Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2021.  Order# 8599 the key did not work.  I contacted your company on several occasions and even submitted a screen shot with the error.  Several individuals contacted me by email from the Tech Team and there was no resolution.  At, this time I am no longer interested in the purchase of this product and have requested a refund.

Review.Titre: THIS COMPANY IS NOT TO BE TRUSTED - FAKE
Review.Contenu: THIS COMPANY IS NOT TO BE TRUSTED - FAKEThey do not deliver what you buy and pay for. I bought Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business for Windows PC for 2 PC and they gave me Microsoft Office 2021 Professional Plus and furthermore they would not do anything about it. I have to open a dispute with my credit card company for my money. Poor ethics and Dishonest. BAD BUSINESS ETHICS...

Tried calling twice but no response. Phone number has a Louisiana area code when business is in Delaware. Would have liked to discuss issue. Posting this review as no reply from getpconline to my complaint. Received MS Home/Student 2019 with key. Key was useless as it was a used key. Resolved by contacting MS. Not at all satisfactory to send a used key! I am a first time buyer; will not use getpconline in the future nor recommend you to friends.

I did not want the order. I needed for multiple devices and didn’t realize till after purchase so I was told too late and to deal with itSupport will not me reverse the purchase siting that they could not refund my money. I am in the process of disputing the charges with my bank.

Review.Titre: the product does not work at all
Review.Contenu: I purchased a software with a licensed key, but after i followed the instruction to install the software "office 2016", it does not work because the product is not activated. I talked and emailed the company, they did not give any useful solutions to fix the problem and refused to refund me.  do not trust their products

Review.Titre: When clicking on the link they sent to…
Review.Contenu: When clicking on the link they sent to enable downloading of the software, my Norton gave me a message that the download could harm my computer.  Tried several times with the same result.  Contacted them and was told to ignore the message, that it was safe.  I contacted them again stating that I believed Norton and could not trust their download.  Was then told I needed to contact Microsoft, to which I responded that I ordered the software from them, not Microsoft, and requested a refund.  Several requested later they still refuse to issue my refund.

My download from site was easy but when i tried to install on my computer, it kept stalling halfway through.  I emailed support.  Still have not heard back from them several days later.  I purchased another download elsewhere and am asking for my money back on this one.  Still getting no responses.   The download i purchased elsewhere worked with no problem at all.  Horrible experience!!!  Do not purchase!!!!  No customer service!

Buyer beware, this is a NO REFUND supplier, I ordered, downloaded, attempted to put in the "key". something went wrong and the key wasn't accepted. I tried for 24 hours to get assistance, no reply, no help, money lost. Be VERY CAUTIOUS, their customer assistance does not exist

Review.Titre: I was able to use my license key for 3…
Review.Contenu: I was able to use my license key for 3 days only. I had to do some repairs on my pc and hag to reinstall windows. After the reinstall my pro version reverted back to home. I contacted Getpconline and told them what happened and they told me I would need to purchase a new key even though they told me when I purchased the original key that it was good for life as long as I didn't alter the hardware in my system. The hardware is still the same. It is a laptop and I don't know how to replace parts in it. Pretty shady if you ask me. I truly think I was ripped off.

Review.Titre: Did not receive an email confirmation…
Review.Contenu: Did not receive an email confirmation with the product code,I logged in to my account to make this purchase,I made 2 other same purchases for different pc's this past week and did receive them,when I went back into my account it did not recognize my password and I tried to reset the password twice by using my email address for a reset,that reset never came,I tested my email and it is sending and receiving correctly,the order # was 4999

Mistakenly purchased the wrong product, online chat gave me an email address to apply for a refund…also advising that they would fully refund. When I emailed they replied that the purchase wasn’t through them. Found another email on their website, they said they would only refund 75%. Wouldn’t trust them especially if you need any kind of real help

This is worst company ever. DO NOT BUY from them. They will rip you off and take your money. I paid them for Microsoft Office for only one computer. I downloaded it to my new computer at home. Put in the key code they gave me and error message came up reading key code has been used already. I tried talking to customer service online all they said they would submit a ticket. 3 weeks went by and nothing. I called the so called customer service number and no answer ever. I left 25 message over 3 weeks and nothing.This is a RIP OFF COMPANY I this helps not to buy from them ever.MH

The item I ordered, OFFICE 2016, said "30 days FREE return", but I got a reply when I asked for a refund that "we do not refund digital products" (or something very close to that). So watch out when ordering from this Company.

Review.Titre: I didn't receive the email right away
Review.Contenu: I didn't receive the email right away, wasn't alerted to it, and had to buy Office from Microsoft so the $49.95 I spent with you guys was wasted as you can tell from your records I never activated the software.  So I suppose it was my fault not waiting long enough?   Not sure.

Review.Titre: I ordered Office 2016 and they sent me…
Review.Contenu: I ordered Office 2016 and they sent me a product code for Office 365. I won't be able to update after a year. They say it's a lifetime product key but there is no lifetime product keys for Office 365. Prove me wrong, if you can!

So disappointed with the download, product downloaded for a long time and when done it would not open also it when to an H drive and never located on my PC, live and learn, Hardest program ever, just wasted my money

Ordered Microsoft Office 365 programs which I thought was for one time charge. After paying this fee, I learned there was an annual subscription cost. If that had been made clear, I would not have ordered fron GetPCOnline.
I ordered MSoft Office 2021Home and Student and when downloaded my computer kept crashing and frequently asked to "resume" only to keep failing and finally showed "error." This product is worthless.

Review.Titre: MS Office key was not authentic- buyer stay away!!!!
Review.Contenu: MS Office key was not authentic. Can’t get ahold of customer service via phone and chat was no help. Requested refund, but not sure when or if I will hear anything. Stay away. It is too good to be true.

Review.Titre: I ordered Microsoft Office and while it…
Review.Contenu: I ordered Microsoft Office and while it was easy to download,when I went to open Word, it was the free, online version of Word somehow configured into the software. It wasn't the full version of Word. I uninstalled, and reinstalled twice and same thing, when I went to open a new Word document it went to the free web version (the internet bar was showing at the top,but the usual notices when you go to use the web version weren't showing). Then it saves any document to the cloud or One NOTE, rather than to your computer. I asked for a refund and they said they can't give one because they have no way if telling if you used it or not. There's a REASON the prices are cheap -- buyers beware.

Review.Titre: No Support - Click to Run Vs Windows Installer

I purchased Office 2021 online and was instructed to download a disk image file. I am in a very remote area and our internet is via metered satellite.  I tried 3 times to download and crashed each time. We blew our monthly data allotment with those 3 tries. Getpconline was not very helpful. They told me they could not deliver the product any other way and would not cancel my purchase nor return my money. I asked if they would put the download on a thumbdrive and mail it to me if I paid for the drive, the postage, and for the service, but they said no. I called my son who lives across the state from us and has cable internet. He downloaded the file, put it on a thumb drive and mailed it to me, just as I has asked getpconline to do. The only reason I rated them as 2 is that I was then able to get a d install the product. Thanks for nothing getpconline.

Review.Titre: I tried to call several times
Review.Contenu: I tried to call several times. Then I went to a chat room and said I tried to call. The person said we don't have a phone line to call. I told them I left 3 messages on the machine. The machine said I would receive a return call shortly. Never happened. The chat person said they would look into it. The phone number is still on the site. The chat person wasn't very helpful either. I bought the product t anyway because of the price. It works fine. It works much better than the company!!! 😆

Everything works fine -Now I have Office Jim

Left a bad taste -- the wasted time could have been avoided with a simple instruction sheet (not provided, even on request -- had to go through chat to solve it).

How can I return this?   Plus it is a very abbreviated version and I can't do many of the things I need to do.  I would like a return of my money..    Other than that it downloaded quickly.

I purchased Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business for Windows x1.  The biggest fear of purchasing these types of products online is whether or not you will receive a key, and if you do get a key, is it authentic.  Fortunately, I got an authentic key.  The reason I gave a 4 star is because I did get an error upon installation.  I contacted getpconline.com support, twice; and never got a response.  I did have to contact Microsoft for tech support. Overall, the product was fine, but there really is no support.

Review.Titre: The great thing is that I received my…
Review.Contenu: The great thing is that I received my download and key! However; I made the purchase right before the Memorial Day Long Weekend Holiday. This might have accounted for the delay in my access to the product download. All is good with the download, install and product key.

Review.Titre: When I tried to load the software
Review.Contenu: When I tried to load the software, it did load it properly, but the Microsoft loading window stayed up which confused me as to the question as to it's completion.  I deleted the software and repeated the process with the same result.  I then launched Word and it asked for the key code and that went as expected.  I had to run the task manager to remove the download window.  Windows 7 Pro.

it was an easy purchase, but the download took me some time to get it right.But finally got everything downloaded.  Problem is it doesn't show that I downloaded or have 2019 per Microsoft.  That is another problem, for another day.  I originally lost everything and had to purchase and install new hard drive. I had to purchase another Microsoft 2019 which I should not have had to purchase another one.  I should have been able to use the same key to download.  But again, Microsoft would not recognize the key or prior or this one.

The software works. After downloading and running  exe file, it did not give me an icon or request the security key. I had to actually open an existing old file to get the box to request the key. Also, if I didn’t know to write the key down I would have been screwed.

Review.Titre: Install issue due to previous Office installed
Review.Contenu: Downloading was easy. I had problems installing it due to the new laptop already having office 365. I had to contact support for help. They told me to download a clean up program and try the install again. That fixed the issue. I wish that would of come with the initial email.

Review.Titre: The Word program has been hard to…
Review.Contenu: The Word program has been hard to install. After two days, we are still trying to work out the bugs. The company has a help link, but we need a phone number to an actual person. Once we get this figured out, I'm sure I'll consider it a fair buy.

Review.Contenu: There were no instructions for the download and I had a few questions.  I contacted customer service and the representative was helpful and answered my questions.  After those questions were answered, the download was easy.

Then I could not open the program 😬. So, I wrote an email to you. I waited a few. Then Googled and found that I need to input product code 🤔. Googled that.🤔. Tried that 3 times before it worked 🙄. Then,  I opened Word and voilà 😏. I say all this to ask you to consider inclusion of detailed steps to take to install a new program🤓. Then, I would give you a 5 and be 🤩 ecstatic.

Review.Titre: I just bought MS Project professional
Review.Contenu: I just bought MS Project professional. I was skeptical because the price was so low so I googled the company. Trustpilot gave it an ok so I went back to getpconline and started a chat. I asked what guarantee they had if the key didn't work. I was told that the key would be replaced with a working key - no refunds. I went back and forth with the person making sure I had an iron-clad statement from her since the guarantee was not on the website.I downloaded the software and installed it with no problem. So, I haven't needed to test the guarantee  . . . yet.  These licenses are sometimes very tricky. Some have a limited number of activations but Getpconline says the key is lifetime. We'll see. But so far so good.

Review.Titre: YOU ARE IN GOOD HANDS WITH PRODUCTS AND SERVICES with THIS COMPANY! :D
Review.Contenu: After trying to purchase a Nintendo Switch as a gift, last year, from an unfamiliar online store (at a drastic discounted rate, during a Black Friday sale); which seemed almost too good to be true; sadly turned out to "be" too good to be true; the entire online storefront was a sham; and thankgetpcs to PayPal I was able to get my purchase monies refunded to me in a timely manner (and, PayPal was by my side through each step)! :D This experience, however, caused me to become very skeptical of future online purchases; stores, and especially sale prices or prices that seemed too good to be true.  With this being said when I came across getpconline.com I was VERY HAPPY and YET, VERY CAUTIOUS.I'm ELATED to share that my experience and purchase with getpconline.com was EXCELLENT!!! Immediately, I was reassured with the presence of an online customer service chat representative (so, I felt I could let my guard down just a little knowing there was a live person on the other end of the website) :D ... I did not use the customer service chat service, however, and proceeded to my purchase of a single item (a bit hesitant because the pricing was SO GOOD)!  The transaction was quick and secure and I had my product via download within minutes.The product contained an .info page (which, I'm assuming were installation directions; I also didn't use that; but, just pointing out that they were available with product purchase); I was able to navigate to the setup of my product and go from there.  During the installation, some computers may "warn you" of the file ... just bypass that and elect to go ahead and complete the installation and within a very short time frame you will have your purchased products on your computer/device (and, fortunately, for the product that I chose; I have that for LIFE; for a single product and device)!  Yippey!! :D lol :pI was SOOOOO HAPPY with their products and services that I purchased the same product for one of my daughters; and, I plan to go back to the site later today and purchase two (2) more of their products.The only question/suggestion that I would make/have is that it appears that they have strictly MS products which is WONDERFUL ... it would be nice to see products such as Quickbooks; Adobe products; as well, if at all possible.Best wishes to the company and its clients ... wishing you much perpetual prosperity and to the clients ... YOU ARE TRULY IN GOOD HANDS WITH BOTH PRODUCTS AND SERVICES! :D
